nodes.text: Jor Entel was the captain of the pirate vessel Night Wind during the Galactic Civil War. Prior to the Demophon supernova, Entel posed as a humanitarian, evacuating people off Demophon for a low fee. In reality he was murdering his passengers and taking their valuables. Enid Vahr fell victim to this scheme.
Entel was also referred to as "O'Roark" in one section of the adventure.
